item.description:
Feature: User Registration Flow  
As a guest user  
I want to register with my personal information  
So that I can have a complete profile in the system

Background:  
Given the user is on the login page

Scenario: Successful user registration with OTP  
When the user enters a valid phone number  
And the system sends an OTP code to the user  
And the user submits the correct OTP code  
Then the user should be redirected to the registration form

```
When the user fills in the registration form with:
  | First Name       | احمد       |
  | Last Name        | سازگار     |
  | Province         | تهران      |
  | City             | تهران      |
  | Education Level  | کارشناسی   |
  | Major            | مهندسی نرم افزار |

 ```

And the user submits the registration form  
Then the user should see a success message "ثبت نام با موفقیت انجام شد"  
When the user logs out from the system  
Then the user should be redirected to the homepage

exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 200ms", function () {

item.name: Student logs in and submits a question(Text)

item.description:
**Feature**: Student asks a question and teacher answers  
**As** a student user  
I want to login and ask my academic question  
**So** that I can receive an answer from a teacher

**Background**:

**Given** the student is on the login page

**Scenario**: **Student logs in and submits a question**  
**When** the student enters a valid phone number  
**And** the system sends an OTP code to the student  
**And** the student submits the correct OTP code  
**Then** the student should be logged in successfully  
**And** the student should be redirected to the Question page  
**When** the student navigates to the "Ask a Question" page  
**And** the student types the question "مفهوم شی‌گرایی در برنامه‌نویسی چیست؟"  
**And** the student submits the question  
**Then** the system should display a confirmation message "سوال شما با موفقیت ثبت شد"  
**Then** the question should be visible in the admin/teacher panel  
**Then** the question should be visible in the student panel

exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 200ms", function () {

item.name: Teacher answers (text) the student’s question

item.description:
**Scenario: Teacher answers text the student’s question**

**Given** a student question "مفهوم شی‌گرایی در برنامه‌نویسی چیست؟" exists in the system  
**When** the teacher logs in to the system  
**And** the teacher navigates to the "Questions" panel  
**And** the teacher writes an answer "شی‌گرایی یک پارادایم برنامه‌نویسی است که..."  
**And** the teacher submits the answer  
**Then** the system should display a success message "پاسخ شما ثبت شد"  
**Then** the question & Answer should be visible in the student panel  
**And** the Student Like submits the answer

**Then** the question & Answer should be visible in the student panel
